description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Mix the perfect cocktail! Find out the flaming drinks and the exclusive gamer drinks! Over 160 drink recipes on your XBOX. Dozens of ingredients and a lot of new ways to find your drink.
